alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 3:22PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yavapai County near Chino Valley through 345 PM MST... At 322 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chino Valley, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chino Valley and Paulden. This includes State Route 89 between mile markers 327 and 340. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
